title: Triple Ginger + Tahini Cookies
directions: Mix tahini, molasses, brown rice syrup, fresh ginger, salt and coconut oil in a bowl until well combined.

Add in ground ginger, buckwheat flour, baking powder and crystalized ginger and stir everything together. The dough should be soft and wet but no sticky. If itâ€™s completely un-workable add another tablespoon or two of flour, if it seems dry add a splash of hot water.

Roll into balls, shape and flatten in your hand to form a disc and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment. Sprinkle a little organic turbinado or rapadura sugar on top if desired or garnish with extra crystalized ginger.
Bake in the oven until just set, about 10-12 minutes then let cool completely before serving.
ingredients: 1/3 cup organic crystalized ginger (sulphite free), chopped
